data.introduce: 该接口用于手动将票价计算组写入 PNR 中，对应黑屏指令FC。
data.business: 同黑屏FC项输入，支持国内、国际的单程、往返、换开及自由文本格式输入。支持婴儿、IT/BT票FC输入。
data.functions:
基于PNR，支持手工按黑屏指令格式写入FC项。
FC项暂不支持主机换行格式。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirFCIntoPNRRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票价计算组输入请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AirFCIntoPNRInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PNR","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"pnr号","children":[]},{"name":"FC","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"手动输入FC指令：FC:PEK CA SHA 1000.00Y CNY1000.00END","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerNames","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名列表","children":[{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]}]},{"name":"Infant","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"婴儿标识","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirFCIntoPNRRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票价计算组返回","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"？错误信息：？","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细 信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Result","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"FC输入返回结果：9位","children":[]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":" -304 ","name":null,"msg":" sending commands too fast, try again later ","msgZh":" 访问速度过快,请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -305 ","name":null,"msg":" transaction times limited ","msgZh":" 访问次数限制 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office permission denied ","msgZh":" Office 没有权限 "},{"code":" -390 ","name":null,"msg":" IBE Service Error ","msgZh":" IBE服务异常 "},{"code":" -311 ","name":null,"msg":" time out, please try again later ","msgZh":" 操作超时，请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -306 ","name":null,"msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":" -1 ","name":null,"msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":" -400 ","name":null,"msg":" format of xml string is not valid ","msgZh":" xml内容格式错误 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" Input error! ","msgZh":" 输入参数出错 "}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirFCIntoPNRRQ>
    <POS>
        <!-- office号,属性PseudoCityCode存值 -->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187"/>
    </POS>
    <AirFCIntoPNRInfo>
        <!-- PNR号 -->
        <PNR>HR6R3T</PNR>
        <!-- FC信息 -->
        <FC>FC:PEK CA SHA 1000.00Y CNY1000.00END</FC>
        <!-- 婴儿标识 -->
        <Infant>false</Infant>
        <!-- 旅客姓名 -->
        <PassengerNames>
            <PassengerName>TEST/ADT</PassengerName>
        </PassengerNames>
    </AirFCIntoPNRInfo>
</TES_AirFCIntoPNRRQ>
